entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Model validation doesn't work well for properties with the `required` keyword #61511
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop #61510
  • Perf regression: https, json, mvc #61509
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json, tls-handshakes-kestrel #61508
  • BL0007 Component parameter should be auto property #61502
  • [Blazor] Improve authentification and usage of web apis #61501
  • Perf regression: json #61500
  • Perf improvement: tls-renegotiation-kestrel #61499
  • webHostOptions.GetFinalHostingStartupAssemblies() returns an empty assembly inside Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.GenericWebHostBuilder.ExecuteHostingStartups() #61498

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly: Warnings about dotnet.runtime.js and dotnet.native.js version mismatch with dotnet.js after publish #61425
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Add interop API to ElementReference #61488
  • On .NET 10 PR3 plain blazor project fails to compile #61466

PullRequests

Merged

  • fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #61494
    area-networking, 8.0.16
  • Publish productVersion files in the right folder #61507
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Update nightly build links to 10.0 #61505
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Enable getting IJSObjectReference to a JS function in Blazor interop #61453
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Replaced comparison with -1 w/ equivalent comparison to 0 #61428
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add IOpenApiDocumentProvider interface and implementation #61463
    area-mvc, area-minimal
  • MVC: Correct metadata type for formdata enum parameters #61399
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools
  • Fix trim annotations on generated validation code #61377
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Cosmos/FullTextSearch: ORDER BY RANK requires OFFSET/LIMIT to be constants, which clashes with EF parameterizing those #35867
    10.0.0
  • Cosmos/VectorSearch: vector search method translator tries to translate all methods on CosmosDbFunctionsExtensions #35853
    10.0.0
  • Cosmos/VectorSearch: add support for vectors on owned types #35852
    10.0.0
  • Cosmos/FullTextSearch: add model builder option for default language #35851
    10.0.0
  • Cosmos: support for full-text search #35476
    10.0.0
  • SQLite: Enable Decimal #19635
    10.0.0
  • [AOT] ```dotnet ef dbcontext optimize --precompile-queries --nativeaot``` fails with error CS9137 #35945

Updated

  • More flexible Include API - allow walking back up include tree #4490
    Backlog
  • All overloads of `AddDbContext`, `AddDbContextPool`, `AddDbContextFactory`, `AddPooledDbContextFactory` accept parameters of type non-generic `DbContextOptionsBuilder` and no overload exists for `DbContextOptionsBuilder<TContext>`. Why is this? #35955
  • Shadow properties ApplicationUserId and ApplicationRoleId created in UserRoles table when using ef migrations with IdentityModel #35842
  • Analyzer warning for using required on DbSet properties #35937
  • Improve exception message when EF.Function is evaluated on the client. #35940
  • Error when moving a child object between parents #35949
  • EF Core 9 no longer applies COALESCE in SQL translation for DefaultIfEmpty() #35950
  • Bad core generation on `ef migrations add lc` #35938
  • How to intercept after loading of navigation properties #35951
  • Exception message for type mismatches #35846
    Backlog
  • Result of left joining a nullable nominal type should be null (i.e. no instance) and not an instance with all null property values #22517
    Backlog
  • Allow mapping optional complex properties #31376
    10.0.0
  • Complex type collection support #31237
    10.0.0
  • `ef migrations add` keep add the same `AlterColumn` migration content for strongly-typed primary key #30699
    10.0.0
  • Merge the dynamic change-tracking delegates into PropertyAccessors #31357
    Backlog
  • Operating on Enum Flags using Enum.GetValues result in wrong SQL generated (_ord) #35821
  • EF9 Migration Performance Regression #35716
  • Consider support for SQL Server 2017's graph processing capabilities #8527
    Backlog
  • Improve the Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite EF Core database provider #22950
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Cosmos Full Text Search support #35868
  • [release/9.0] Bump version of Cosmos SDK from 3.45 to 3.48 to improve hybrid search experience out of the box #35954
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.5
  • SQLite: implement MAX/MIN/ORDER BY for `decimal` #35606
    community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Merge Cosmos full-text search support from release/9.0-staging #35953

Updated

  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL #34171
    community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35932

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom views cannot bind their own properties to another bindable object, like its parent `Page` or a view model, etc. #29013
  • Media Picker throws Java.Lang.NullPointerException on Android Devices #29008
  • [NET10] Obsolete ` .UseMauiCompatibility()` #29006
    .NET 10 Planning
  • dotnet publish fails to build .NET MAUI 9 app #29004
  • [iOS] Auto Resize chrome icons on iOS to make it more consistent with other platforms #29003
    .NET 10.0-preview5
  • BUG: FontAttributes="Bold" on iOS has no effect in .NET MAUI (x .NET 9.0) #28995
  • [Windows] The flyout content width is not being set correctly after updating to WinUI SDK 1.7. #28991
  • [MAUI ][Android][CS-Script]Throw exception 'IO_FileNotFound_FileName' in 'Release' mode #28989

Closed

  • [Blazor Hybrid] BlazorWebView ComponentType error blocks XAML Hot Reload updates #20669
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Maui custom fonts #28992
  • Title #28952
  • [Android, 9.0] dotnet-trace creates a broken nettrace file (and no Speedscope file) #28982
  • Flow Direction updates are ignored in Android #15182
  • Image Control Loses Image on Page Navigation in Android #18656
  • Unable to click Label Spans position in CollectionView item #23318
  • Integration of Brother Printer SDK with .NET MAUI on iOS issue with Sharpie #28993
  • Aspire integration for service discovery #18802
    .NET 10 Planning
  • RealParent on Syncfusion.Maui.Core.BadgeSettings has been Garbage Collected. #28990
  • Poor JS execution when using EvaluateJavaScriptAsync #28970
  • Titre : Demande d'amélioration : Support pour la création de clavier système Android IME #28979

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Accessibility Selected for Android and iOS CollectionView #29014
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr6] Avoid qualified name in x:Type binding for Blazor Hybrid template #29011
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Avoid qualified name in x:Type binding for Blazor Hybrid template #29010
  • Use latest map renderer for Android Google Maps #29007
    platform/android 🤖, p/0, area-controls-map, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Grouping Feature #29002
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve MSBuild Error Actionability in Resizetizer #28999
    area-single-project
  • [Android, Windows] Fixed App.Current.PageDisappearing not raised when a page is popped #28998
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [DO NOT MERGE][net10.0] 20250414 net10.0 ecosytem updates #28997
  • [Windows] Fixed the flyout content width not being set correctly after updating to WinUI SDK 1.7 #28996
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit #28994
    area-architecture, .NET 10 Planning

Merged

  • Avoid qualified name in x:Type binding for Blazor Hybrid template #29005
    area-templates
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28867 - MAC Screenshot #29009
  • Add IsAspireSharedProject prop to ServiceDefaults template #28984
    area-templates, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28867 #28964
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [net10.0] Update arcade #28980
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Update arcade #29000
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Changes to fix Android emulators boot issues on Linux #28882
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty in SR5 #28971
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Controls Disappear When WebView is Used with Hardware Acceleration Disabled #28934
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • Avoiding issues installing Appium on Linux #28845
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [2025/04/11] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28867
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR7
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Start adding the ability to intercept all requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [WiP] SafeArea #28556
    area-layout, .NET 9 SR7
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28937
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android]Fix: Swapping out the content of a RefreshView breaks on Android #28944
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-refreshview
  • [iOS] Fix: ActivityIndicator IsRunning ignores IsVisible when set to true #28983
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator
  • Fix CarouselView Regression #28955
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6.1
  • [Testing] Publish new snapshots and diffs to a specific artifacts folder #27928
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView EmptyView Feature #28679
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fix for IndicatorView using templated icons not working #28905
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fixed - MAUI WebViewer not working on MacOS even after allowing permissions to wkWebView #28841
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Shell flyout background image does not displayed #28977
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    area-single-project, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [inflight][Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28953
    community ✨
  • Modernize MediaPicker iOS #28920
    area-essentials, essentials-mediapicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Compute LayoutConstraints on new *StackLayout and Grid #28931
    area-layout, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fixed BarTextColor applied to secondary toolbar items #28932
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the OnPlatform does not work for header property in Collection view #28935
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Decompiler needs to be updated to decompile .NET 10 assemblies #78161
  • API for generating the virtual project behind file-based programs #78159
  • Ignored directives report errors in disabled regions #78157
  • Suggestion for simplifying field access in non-partial properties #78156
  • BuildHost does not update properly in incremental builds #78153
  • CS8618 suggests using `required` on static properties #78152

Closed

  • Debugging code generated by IIncrementalGenerator fails due to missing output files #78143
  • Collection expressions: adjust the plural in CS1503 #70183
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure FindSourceDefinitionAsync works in frozen compilation cases #78164
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Emit CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute for instance operators #78163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Revert "Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from codelens layer (#78045)" #78162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Local-Symbol Containing-Symbol in New-Extension-Method-Rewriter for Capture Analysis #78160
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Avoid ignored directive errors in disabled regions #78158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Move DiagnosticService impl down to Features layer #78155
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Allow `readonly` modifier for instance operators #78151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Implement CRef binding for compound assignment operators #78111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Use ReadOnlySpans #78141
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue #70183: adjust the plural for expression collection #78110
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Make Razor redirect code more robust #78039
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle textDocument/didChange notifications that don't pass across the range #78165
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow Razor cohosting to run in VS Code, and fix it in VS #78167
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: Track stale projects #78166
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Start moving workspace events to fire on background threads #78134
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • CSharp Completion Context - Add method caller context #78032
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix razor analyzer loading #78116
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add VirtualProjectGenerator API #78145
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Initial stubs for doing analysis of copilot changes to help us drive post-change cleanup work. #78146
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not parse URIs during LSP serialization/deserialization #76691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove executable directory from `NATIVE_DLL_SEARCH_DIRECTORIES` for single-file applications #114717
  • superpmi collection pipeline timeouts in libraries tests #114715
  • MemoryCache entry eviction is based on system memory usage, not cache memory usage #114714
  • [API Proposal]: Inherit LibraryImport from class to reduce rewriting code #114708
  • Allow building on FreeBSD/i386 #114705
  • Timeout in HostFactoryResolverTests.NoSpecialEntryPointPatternCanRunInParallel #114704
  • [UB] Unsigned Mach-O files being reported in osx builds #114701
  • [8.0] Long running test timeout: Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.WasmAppBuilderDebugLevelTests.BuildWithExplicitValue #114698
  • [9.0] profiler handles.sh long running test then unable to open dump json file #114693
    10.0.0
  • System.Text.Json should recognize $schema as a metadata property. #114691
  • [API Proposal]: SVE AddRotateComplex should use an enum #114685
  • JIT compiler error while adjusting IL code in JITCompilationStarted with InitializeForAttach #114683
  • [API Proposal]: Add APIs to `JsonMarshal` to get the underlying sequence/span from the Utf8JsonReader. #114679
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 4/13/2025 6:59:35 AM +00:00 #114695
  • .NET DateTime date out of range error only on Windows ARM VM (Parallels on Mac M4 or vmware fusion) #114677
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 4/8/2025 3:19:55 PM +00:00 #114697
  • .NET 9 启动崩溃 #114673
  • ML-DSA: Assert signing empty span #114665
    10.0.0
  • Please update Binaryen in emsdk #114723
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Generic & simd `BigMul`, `MultiplyHigh`, and `MultiplyLow` #114663

Closed

  • Tagged memory cache implementation #36562
  • Memory Cache Limits #36567
  • Memory Cache RefreshAfter #36497
  • Guidance on IOptionsMonitor vs IOptions #36013
  • [Suggestion] Analyzer for validating Data Contract and Data Member attributes #42412
  • Double-to-Decimal conversions are not as faithful as they could be. #42775
  • Request to add some example for `system.security.cryptography.pkcs` namespace class functions #42890
  • [GeneratedComInterface] in CCW-only mode produces CA2256 warning #90922
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failures on Android #114634
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById() parses input differently on Linux #114703
  • Exception when loading native dlls from the application path when using AssemblyDirectory and System32 as the DllImportSearchPath #111825
    10.0.0
  • CertificateRequest.CreateSelfSigned with ECDSA with invalid key usage #42751
  • DateTime Precision variant, which would allow to have nanoseconds fully, currently mising in .NET 9/10 #114680
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: stores #94011
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: scatter stores #94014
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: loads pt 2 #97831
    10.0.0
  • where call `mono_wasm_init_finalizer_thread` browser-wasm use single thread #114684
  • TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException catches quic exceptions with kestrel combined with grpc + http3 #114128
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Example usages of a VectorSVE API #88140
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: maths #94009
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: gather loads #94007
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: loads #94006
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: fp #94005
    10.0.0
  • Log Debug even when no debugger attached (support DbgView) #36564
  • DependencyInjection add factory for generated classes #36410
  • Change TryAdd IServiceCollection extensions to return "something" #36492
  • API Proposal: Register injectable services using an attribute #36749
  • Add ability to group related service configurations #37867
  • EventLog should support directory generation #42475
  • Add LogLevel.Notice (for syslog) #39848
  • Add IOwned interface #40890
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: firstfaulting #94004
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: mask #93964
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: mask part 2 #98184
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: counting #94003
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: bitwise #93887
    10.0.0
  • 使用 .net 9 runtime 发布的不包含和包含的环境的WPF应用在个别机器上无法通过exe文件运行 #114671
  • [9.0] Test failure GC_Features._Bridge_BridgeTester_BridgeTester_._Bridge_BridgeTester_BridgeTester_cmd #114650
  • [release/9.0][mono] GC_Features runtime test crash #114631
  • LoongArch64: Track the progress of nativeaot test cases passing on LoongArch64. #104661
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 10/15/2024 10:23:56 PM - Cloning Change #109123
    10.0.0
  • Replace ZipArchive calls of stream.Read with stream.ReadExactly or stream.ReadAtLeast #114026
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase libraries run timeouts from default 150 to 300 minutes. #114722
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ordered evaluation in FileSystemGlobbing Matcher #114720
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Update DllImportSearchPathTests to avoid relying on any previous cached load #114719
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Escape analysis cleanup #114716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [APX] test some experiment changes on CI #114713
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Try to find memory usage in LibraryImportTests #114707
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #114700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix inconsistent newline format when logging exceptions to console. #114692
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add more tests for SmtpClient #114690
    area-System.Net
  • WebSocket: observe exceptions in WaitForServerToCloseConnectionAsync #114689
    area-System.Net
  • [cDAC] Handle non-mapped images correctly #114688
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Integer min/max intrinsics #114687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Inline boot config #114686
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114682
    os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #114678
    area-System.Net, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #114676
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.x
  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Fixes grammar in comments for Gen2GcCallback.cs #114674
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add null check for EnumerationOptions #114672
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #114668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] Improve the functionality of LoongArch64 R2R #114666
    area-Single-File, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Merged

  • Add guidelines for source generators in `dotnet/runtime` #114709
    documentation, area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reapply "Don't use incompatible LOAD_LIBRARY_SEARCH flags when using LOAD_WITH_ALTERED_SEARCH_PATH" #114651
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix CA2256 in COM generator when using 'ManagedObjectWrapper' #114642
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Produce the productVersion.txt files in runtime in the "final publish" step so we don't need to munge them through the different runtime jobs #114706
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reimplement PR 112032, preserve trailing extra data when updating ZIP files #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataModule APIs SOS uses to read line numbers #114491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/9.0-staging to release/9.0 #114662
    NO-SQUASH, Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Add an IsFuncletCache to the EECodeInfo #114580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][interp] Jiterp packedsimd shifts #114669
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [S.N.Quic] Observe exceptions in ResettableValueTaskSource #114226
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Propagate `Type.GetInterfaces` through dataflow analysis #114149
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • disable/trim MetricsHandler when System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter.IsSupported is false #114326
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Revert 114347 + MSBuild tasks leak workaround + HotReload workaround #114643
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • MLDsaOpenSsl + tests #114485
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ML-KEM: X509Certificate2.GetMLKemPublicKey #114657
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Fix initialization of can_reduce_color #114637
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][interp] Disable PackedSimd operator aliases while we investigate #114659
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use `Stream.ReadAtLeast` when loading ZipArchives #114256
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #114661

Updated

  • Interpreter EH support in the runtime #114649

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix instance method handling in DI #3091
  • [RuntimeAsync] Model async continuation definition via delay-free #3090
    area-async

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Mark continuation GC return for arm64/arm32/LA64/RISCV64 #3089
    area-async
  • [RuntimeAsync] Removed IsStructMethodOperatingOnCopy #3088
    area-async

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet reference` commands do not recognize <PROJECT_PATH>argument #48487
  • `dotnet dev-certs` should be able to export to a pfx without a password #48482
  • `dotnet dev-certs` should have the ability to import the generated cert into the machine store #48481
  • obj\project.assets.json is deleted after clean build if Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Publish is added #48478
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc][Regression] Workload information in .NET 10 Preview 4 is not localized #48451

Closed

  • H #48294
  • Get rid of the "untriaged" auto-label on Github issues #47844
  • Evaluate usefulness and correctness of ValidateBundledManifestSigning target #41081
  • Look into expanding our test matrix to include scenarios impacted by the recent TFM changes #13734
    Discussion
  • AssemblyName can not use condition in multiple target frameworks project #22469
  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2: dotnet publish --runtime fails when project has EFMigrations #22357
  • `dotnet run` doesn't set SolutionDir #22342
  • .NET 6 RC 2 PublishReadyToRun=true causes TypeLoadException at MethodInfo.GetCustomAttributes(bool) in certain conditions #22258
  • .NET 6 RC2 SDK: runtimeconfig.json wrong version for self-contained netcoreapp3.1 #22215
  • Project cannot be run with the X64 architecture using the .NET RC 2 SDK for Apple Silicon / ARM64 #22176
  • .NET Core SDK installed via snap not working on Raspberry Pi OS? #22167
  • Properties provided to dotnet run are also tunneled through to the application regardless of double dash (--) with .NET 5 #22133
  • dotnet format in SDK 9.0.200 throws FileNotFoundException for .slnx solutions #47038
    10.0.1xx
  • GenerateToolsSettingsFile races to write DotnetToolSettings.xml in parallel MTFM builds. #47696
  • C# Android App - take photo without confirmation button #47280
  • How to install the latest .NET 8 and 9 on ubuntu 22.04? #44869
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47595
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47615

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding new training and labeler per the instructions #48495
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable VMR synchronization #48479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • System.CommandLine update #48477
    untriaged
  • Add the test verifying property functions used in dotnet console/webapp don't need a reflection #48475
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reenable CheckTargetFrameworkDisplayName test #48471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48470
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean-up VMR repo projects #48436
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Require Licence Acceptance when installing tools #48501
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [WIP] dotnet run: --from-source #48443
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/9.0.3xx] light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47691
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 R2R resolve #45236
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48496
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Helix queues to osx.15.amd64|arm64 #45543
    Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown
  • Update all test sdk references to the latest version. #45548
    Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown
  • Refactor GetPackageNameFromDependency #45873
    Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown
  • Investigate Helix Arm64 timeouts #46243
    Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Github Actions] Remove Branch Lockdown Labels on Branding Merge #48181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Reduce specific test executions times #48405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • package-add: Use PackageIdentityArgument #48402
    untriaged
  • VMR vs MSFT signing comparison #48404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Support OfficialBuildId for SB #48327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers, DO NOT MERGE
  • Promote `NuGet.Client` builds during official CI #48311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
